Lisa on Contact Theory w champions to help connect People W Lived Experience of MH w broader groups. Use @SaleForce, CRM, track contacts
Lisa says SeeMe uses rights PANEL approach - Participation, Accountability, Non-discriminatory, Empowering, Legality. Need integratn + power
Lisa of https://t.co/jgSYIu0sHz says they include people w lived experience of MH issues at all levels = heart of SeeMe prog #WalkingtheTalk
Lisa Cohen: engage w people on what good health means for people & work w people w MH issues to improve own wellbeing. Social media 4 msgs
Focus of Lisa's talk so far: What changes can people do & how to engage w them on what's OK for them eg cut down drinking vs stop totally
Lisa says issues for people in Scotland similar to those in New Zealand. In both stigma from mental illness label can be worse than MH issue
